title: Is Yogi Adityanath's Comic Book better than the Legendary Bal Narendra? | Manuj Chawla
selftext:
Ajay To Yogi Adityanath is a deeply dull and weirdly funny comic that will give the legendary Bal Narendra comic a run for its money. However, I’m a Bal Narendra OG fan forever.

Ajay To Yogi Adityanath - Fascinating Story of Grit, Determination, and Hardwork, yes that’s the full name - Was launched in 51+ schools of Uttar Pradesh on the 5th of June, the 51st birthday of, Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath, and who know maybe one day the BJP and Modi Government will make it a part of the curriculum. Lol. #Ajay2Yogi
